responses.title: Let the name Mars ring across the battlefield, and bear witness to my enemy's flight.
To war! And glorious conquest! Yaaahh!
To those behind, rally! To those ahead... Kneel!
Oh ho, I live for this!
Spreading enlightenment at the tip of my spear.
Call me protector, call me death!
Mars! So good to see you!
I am war; I am without end!
To war! And glorious conquest! Yaaahh!
To those behind, rally! To those ahead... Kneel!
Oh ho, I live for this!
Some say all the great wars have already been won... But I say when we're done here.
Spreading enlightenment at the tip of my spear.
Call me protector, call me death!
I've turned over a new spear.
Time for some good old fashioned diplomacy!
Who beats the drums of war?!
The requisite sacrifices may be lacking, but I find the competition intriguing for once...
My allegiance will never be to an Ancient, only to victory!
Only a fool would stand against me.
Time to save the world. Then they'll all see.
Be grateful the fate of all mortal life rests with me!
Hahahaha! Rejoice! For the age of Mars begins!
Forget what you know. Believe only what you see.
Do I catch the scent of ash on the wind?
It was only a matter of time.
Let the name Mars ring across the battlefield, and bear witness to my enemy's flight.
I hope you four are good at following orders!
A god by any other name...
A god by any other name... Is just as dangerous.
I'm not interested in anyone's plans. The flow of battle will dictate the day!
I'm not sorry for what I've done. But I can do better.
You can call this one... I've never lost and I'll not start now!
Time to put this thing in the bag and drown it in the river.
At last... it comes to blows!
DaDaDa Da Da! What a tune!
DADADA DA DA DA-DA-DA! DADADA DA DA DA-DA-DA! DADADA DA DA DA-DA-DA!
I'll make a point of it.
The spear can't have all the fun!
I never let go of my shield!
Try to make it a challenge.
I'll shatter the air itself to find you!
You can't cut down a god!
The fight ends when I say!
Forgive my men. They used to be mortal.
What now your dreams of glory?
All that will be remembered is that you fell.
Face your ancestors in the afterlife!
You dishonor the rites of blood!
At this rate, the whole god moniker feels a bit quaint.
Bow before the might of Mars!
Ahahah! You call that a fight?
Cheer up! Even my lesser foes are remembered.
It's an honorable death, by my hand!
Don't look at me. It's your own damn fault!
There, there. Have a good cry in the afterlife.
Ha ha ha! I'll always remember how foolish you looked...
The only one surprised by this is you.
Any more where that came from?
You're not fit to fight in my war!
Best you leave the fighting to a real hero.
Come on, get up! Oh...you're spent...
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Oh ho ho ho ho ha ha haha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha haa!
Huh huh. Aha ha hahah ah ahaha!
Huh Huh aha ha ha ah ha ha haa!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
You'll never stand equal to Mars!
Can we hurry this along? I already know how it ends...
DADADA DA DA DA-DA-DA! DADADA DA DA DA-DA-DA!
You sip at the cup of power. I have no need.
Even I know when to stop swinging, Abaddon.
There's no honor in killing the little one, but I'll enjoy it all the same.
Stimulants are nothing to a god's strength!
It always feels good to kill an ancient one.
Ah, that feels nice. I'd worked up a sweat!
The only fun in fighting you was when you died.
You didn't need to go through all the trouble.
Don't worry, Zet. I'll bring them all crashing down.
You lack none of the brutality of war and you still had no chance.
Haha! That was fun, but the outcome was predictable!
My nightmares evacuate bigger than you!
This is where mortal bravery leads.
Even the beasts will prostrate themselves before me!
You caught the wrong scent, Bloodseeker.
The mourners will be fresh with drink!
I never heard any toasts in my name!
Stand or flee, it makes no difference!
These quills have a nice tingle to them!
The order of my ranks withstands the chaos charge!
Gods forge order from the chaos!
No matter how many creatures you enslave, you die alone, you weak-willed fool.
Problem solved! You should have come to me sooner.
Just remember, I didn't break your spine. Your own armor did that.
If you can't fight skin bared, you can't fight at all!
Are you sure you're in the right place?
If it's on the battlefield, I kill it!
Your strategy played right into my strategy!
I used to pluck the wings from faeries as a boy. I thought I was past that!
Respectable, but I've seen many last longer.
? Please. I've seen things you priests wouldn't believe.
I warned you to keep your mouth shut around me!
Your powers hold no sway over the gods, crone!
A true warrior doesn't need a dramatic name.
There, I've cured you of your God envy.
Hahaha, now that's a shield bash!
make a fine mount, but you don't have the temperament.
Ugh, you horrid creature. I've done the world a favor!
Your puny wind just makes my cape blow even more attractively.
Well, that was easy enough. Can cross you off the list.
Your mind is like porridge. How could you have won?
Oh, something about that felt extra nice.
Sometimes it's just fun to destroy a truly rare specimen.
Aw, damn. This one's not even gold!
Stoke the fire and carve a spit!
I'll poke two holes here so you can see the river Styx.
I had time enough to dispatch YOU.
You leave nothing of worth behind.
Give my regards to your masters!
I don't need all that fancy crap to kick your ass!
Why has it come to this, Io?
Now my uncle's collection is complete.
Your brilliance ends in darkness, old man. Just like all the rest...
All who came before me must perish!
Drown on your tears, you salty mess.
How many times do you need to die before you learn your lesson?
You should have chosen literally anyone else.
And I heard you were such a great commander. Hahah!
Hard to bite down with a spear in your gullet!
You should thank me, creature. This death brings honor to one I suspect has none!
At least you already know the way!
A single augmentation can't make up for the paltry sum of your parts.
There's no pleasure in the killing of sheep.
Shift your way out of that!
The question now becomes... Shall I skin you for a rug?
This is the ugliest damn unicorn I've ever killed.
The horn doesn't look that valuable to me... But maybe for drinking!
Poor little princess. Poised to the last... for naught.
I'll have to embellish your death when I tell this story...
It's hard to believe it took this long for someone to kill you.
Sing your song for my uncle. See if he cares!
I would have once found your pursuits amusing, Necrophos. No more.
Aren't you beautiful? I'll mount your head above the mantle!
Oops. I thought you'd surrender when things got tough.
I'll keep your tongue as a talisman for a time!
You're just a glorified guard dog.
You die as you lived, like a fool.
There's no grace in this death, assassin.
Is this your knife in my shield, wastrel?
Attacking from all sides? A classic mistake!
Your flesh will rest upon this field for all of time, a monument to my victory!
The help shouldn't lift a hand against their betters.
Did you take me for mortal, whipping boy?
At least you tried to steal from the best.
I abandon you to a desert of the forgotten!
Let that be a message to all deserters!
Where'd you learn how to use a trident?
I'll use your guts as bait for a bigger fish.
Oh, I'm sorry. Were you in the middle of something?
You're out of practice, Spectre. Too soft for the real fight.
Shame to kill such an interesting beast. At least it was fun.
If only you'd bent to my will... Oh well. I may keep the ring.
Each one of your kin will die by my hand!
I thought I could use you. I was wrong.
Your past accomplishments mean nothing, and your future is at an end.
Bedtime stories for demons don't scare me.
, Terrorblade... Only to put you down.
Even the one you serve serves another.
Normally I wouldn't trouble myself with the touched...
Well, found the cure for madness!
Best to melt this down before someone else gets any bright ideas.
The gods will not suffer a mortal so clever as you.
Crushing rocks is a baby's game!
You'll make a fine whetstone for my spear.
Fear not, I shall build something grand with you!
Your meaningless fights sully the name of war!
This is where your limitations begin, and you end.
. Did others fight in your place?
There were many who prayed for your death, Underlord. Prayers answered.
There is nothing that I cannot kill!
The dirge is a nice tune, but you can't carry it for a damn.
Time for a new pair of boots!
You're a mere decoration compared to me!
What did you think was going to happen, bookworm?
Write a poem about it in the afterlife.
It'll take more than chants and charms, you imbecile.
I know a thing or two about hubris, and you had this coming!
I'll scatter your bones from here to the pits of hell!
This isn't your pantheon anymore, old man.
I've been waiting a long time for this!
I thought that would be much more satisfying...
You're just as pathetic a mortal as you were a god...
I didn't come here to exchange pleasantries. It's time for you to die!
There's something beautiful to all of this.
My father? Let me tell you about my father...
You whine like a mortal fool.
Yours was a sad tale. But now it's over!
None pass unseen into the underworld!
This is why your kind should stick to frivolities.
, you should have known better, Shadow Fiend.
Stick to the sideshow work, magician!
What do you know? Silence is nice after all!
You almost count for half a kill.
You could have saved us all a lot of trouble and done this yourself.
You should have offered me a cookie!
The lizard's death is on you!
No one controls a god while I'm around!
Not even the fates control me!
You should have made me kill myself, because that was your only chance!
It's important to savor some of the special ones.
Now to find your litter to raid.
After all I've done for you!
When you charge at me, you'd best not miss!
I cannot see your wounds for the tears in my eyes...
Ahahahaha! Not much to that really!
As goes my spear goes the war!
You're all playing my game now.
First Blood! Haha! I thought it'd come sooner.
You're gonna look real funny with no legs, Arachnia. Just to let you know.
Come to your senses! This behavior leads only to ruin!
How about I just kill one head, Ogre?
Your corpse will be lasting monument to my greatness!
I'll beat you to death with an olive branch!
I'm done with the dour. What reason have I to worry?
You didn't need to go through all the trouble. I could have solved this problem for you ages ago.
Which one of you two would win in a fight?
People say we'd make a good team. But don't get carried away; I make a good team with anyone.
Red skin in battle must be pretty convenient. Not that I'd need it, but you know... for you.
So strange to see you when I'm awake, Bane. I thought you only came in pleasant dreams...
Oh! This guy's creepy... Just what we needed!
What did I just step in?!
I didn't catch your name, flappy.
Don't worry. They don't even hurt the animals in the sacrifice, they only slaughter them.
You'll love roaring in the arena!
I'm coming for them. Happy hunting!
I had a kind of a hound once. He got on mother's bad side...
If someone puts a contract on my father, I'll double your fee to leave him for me.
No, I don't need your services, Bounty Hunter. Lot of names on my list, but I've got as long as it takes and longer!
All right! I was hoping we'd run into each other.
If you can't do it drunk, it's not worth doing.
If you were under my command, turning your back would mean death.
Blood, viscera...the stench of battle? Don't mar it with your foul goo.
Are any of these babies up for adoption?
Maybe I'll settle down and have kids someday...
I carry an apple for just such an occasion!
You're a bit ugly, but you might make a passable companion.
There's a lot to like about you, Chaos Knight. But I don't get the feeling you're on my side...
And at my heels, the riders of a grim dawn!
Honestly, Ken, you're lucky I acknowledge your presence at all.
Hey, Ken, got a line on any chimeras? Oh, sorry Chen.
Maybe you should sit this one out if you're so worried about getting scratched...
I know a thing or two about sibling rivalry. The only outcome is war!
are of little interest to me, faerie.
I feel inclined to like you for some reason, Disruptor...
I'm not interested in talking about my father. Or hearing about yours.
Your filial defiance is inspiring, Doom Bringer.
You're fortunate, friend. Most mortals never know the power you now possess.
All things considered, you should take more care around dying animals.
I always excelled at boulder toss as a child.
Why so serious? There's battle ahead!
I think I've 'et some of your relatives!
I'll stay my spear today, Enigma. But I make no promises in the days to come.
When you were a child, did you blow time bubbles?
Are you ageless as well, traveller?
Your personality paints me in an even godlier light.
I've done some--in hindsight--morally questionable things. But for fun! Your crimes just seem petty.
You use the fire dust amusingly, Mr. Copter.
Just get ready to drop that bomb in the arena!
Someday we will fight, and it will be glorious.
No, no, no! The priests are supposed to worship *you*, not the other way around.
Yours is a special kind of vanity, Invoker.
Let me juggle your tiny orbs, Invoker!
My oldest friend... You've helped me through some dark times.
No one gets me like you do, Io.
Fire and ice! Reminds me of a song I once heard.
How does that mask stay on when you're spinning?
There must be something broken in your inner ear, Yurnero.
Sing me a song, Admiral. The grog is working!
If only you'd met me sooner. I know someone with an amount of influence in matters nautical!
Finally, someone with a proper sense of battle attire!
Do you even know why we fight, creature?
Stick with me and you'll go as far as one of your ill fortune can get.
It's fair to blame your parents, Lina. Sounds like the whole mess was really their fault.
You pretend to be so wicked, Lion. But I saw you dancing!
Of all the powers to seek...why demonkind?!
So you used to hurt folks and now try to help? How's it working out?
The mortal mind considers such gifts a curse?
I feel some good vibes coming off of you, new friend!
You're soft-headed, but I guess you mean well.
I'd heard stories, but you're even more annoying face to face...
My spear sings in harmony, Naga!
Remind me never to step indoors with you. Phew!
I've followed some of your work, Night Stalker. I'm expecting big things!
Fascinating! There's a massive growth on this ogre's head!
Stand back everyone! This ogre's going to cast a spell on you.
Look, I humor you priest, but don't push it.
I'm always accepting new worshippers, Omniknight.
That's not what an oracle looks like!
If you spoil the ending of this fight, I'll...Well, I'm sure you can work out the rest!
are complete idiots. You're not so bad!
Pray to whatever god you believe in that my name never appears on your list.
Do you even like your job, assassin?
And to think, you could have died as just another pathetic mortal.
Today's going to be a busy day, butcher!
I would never guess we had so much in common!
It's all a pleasure to me too, Akasha.
Oh great, the bureaucracy is here too...
Don't worry, Razor, no one's trying to have any fun here...
I don't know if you know this, but I can still kind of see you...
You're a teetotaler? What does that mean?
Folks seem to give you a wide berth, Rubick. Maybe wash the robes?
You remind me of a tutor I once killed.
Why, who'd want to be king of sand?
Get in there sandy claws! Hey, you said it first.
Fighting demons is almost beneath me. So befriending one probably is too.
Do gods even have souls, demon? I thought we were kind of....pre-soul.
A mortal has no business transmogrifying anything!
spellcaster? Huh! What will they think of next?
Take it from me, Skywrath, that ship has sailed.
Do you know how to whistle, Slardar?
The drylands are glad to have you in this fight, Slardar.
I don't often associate with common criminals, but I'm feeling generous.
It's funny because on one hand, look how you make war! But on the other, at least you make war...
Nothing like going into battle a little shorthanded, eh? Hehehe.
You take care of the boring stuff. I'll do the rest!
Where do you think you're going?!
Don't get started before I'm in the fray!
If anyone asks, you're the lord of thunder in my book!
You should come to my next family reunion. You'd be a hit!
Break out a warcry, Sven! Or your heart's not in it!
Your kind don't need to fear me anymore, Tidehunter. Those capricious days are behind me.
You do pretty well for a sniveling coward, Rizzrack!
With your help, an army of spearmen could be outfitted in no time!
Yours is a particularly foul kind of magic, Tinker. Almost any mortal might wield it!
What do you mean you don't believe in gods, Tinker?
Teeny... Puny... Miniscule... Infinitesimal! There were plenty of better choices.
I'm only a handful of generations into this whole helping people thing. Any pointers?
In the old days, I never stopped to admire how beautiful the battlefield really is.
I already tire of your antics, Troll...
The trolls I've killed have been a lot bigger...
You've got the right idea, Tusk. Most of these fools walk a grim path.
If you had a longer lifespan, you might really be something someday, Tusk!
I'll see how well you fight before I bother talking to you...
Listen, you don't need to actually hum the dirge. It does just fine on its own.
Funny, I'll never have a tombstone...
How can you stand that Razor fellow?
I appreciate your position, Visage, even if I don't desire it.
Burn your scrolls, wizard! This is war, not some damned symposium!
How do you even lift that tome, wizard?
I love how you slay with a smile, ranger.
You're the oddest dragon I've ever seen, and I've seen Jakiro!
What do you want from me little man?! Oh, you're here to fight?
Admit it, you wish you could be me, Ostarion.
You had to work so hard for cut-rate immortality...
Keep that thunder to yourself. I don't wanna hear it, Zeus.
No, this isn't a chance to re-forge a broken bond. I'm not interested.
Just shut up already! I know what I'm doing.
It's been too long since you overthrew the titans, Zeus. Perhaps it's time for a new godly order.
I don't answer to that name anymore, you old fool.
I respect your methods, Anti-Mage, but you've really got to lighten up!
What kind of example are you setting for the youngsters, Ezalor?
Long have I admired your steed, Ezalor.
My apologies, Gorgon. I was in no position to help anyone in those days...
If my father showed any true leadership, your family's woes would never have come to pass.
Break out the fireworks, little ones!
So which inane demonic law did you run afoul of, Terrorblade?
It's rare to see one of those beasties tamed!
Can he spit a bit of that on my spear here?
Ah la la la! I caaaan't heeaaar yoooouuu!
Wait, I don't see any strings...
When I put an enemy in the arena, don't let them out!
You can chew on whatever I leave in my wake!
Together again. This time will be different, I promise!
Where does the time go, my dear? You've been away too long...
I see why mortals like this.
Is this how all fortunes are made?
I see why mortals like this.
Is this how all fortunes are made?
Oh! Aha! That's one of ours!
Oh! Aha! That's one of ours!
Take your shiny coins and be done with it!
There, is that enough of this money you whine for?
I don't know why, but I want this.
It kind of looks like a spear...
We'll go far together, little knife!
It's almost as good as MY heart!
Tarrasque? I thought I took care of those...
This'll get right to the point...
Are you sure this is even a weapon? Looks like some sort of measuring stick...
It isn't glamorous...but it does the trick!
I would have seen them anyway...
I've always liked a good scary mask.
They don't call it rear guard. Let's go!
I can hear the pulped brains already!
Anyone have any fruit? For testing!
No arcanery holds sway over the gods!
Do your worst, wizards! My spear will find you!
This thing proves magic's all in your head.
Wait, why do I need this?
What kind of war is this?!
You dare strike the god of war?!
Valor, my love... I've failed you.
Well played! I didn't think you had what it takes...
Well, well, well... A real killer on the loose...
I don't think you understand who you're dealing with!
My body falls, but the might of Mars will prevail!
I am war; I am without end!
This is what the fates give me?!
Now that was a good trick!
You'll have to do a lot more than kill me!
Dead? Not me. I just got here!
I think they've worn out their welcome.
The odds of that happening again have to be zero.
I never thought it'd come to this... Neat!
If that happens again, I might take it personally...
Mars! So good to see you!
I'm not one to stay down...
You're going to regret this for the rest of your life!
I thought I might find this here...
Even I don't know where they come from... And I'm a god!
Mine is truly a blessed life.
I didn't think it was possible.
Like a dip in the sacred pools...
This age of gods will soon meet its end.
As my father struck down the titans, I too shall strike down the vestiges of his archaic pantheon!
What comes to pass when the ageless live on without change?
Through what endless cycles does one waste a god's ambition?
The selfish ways of my ancestors were long my ways...but no more!
By my father's many MANY examples, the hollow path of my lineage has been laid bare!
I disown my heritage, and vow that the flight of my spear will never again be so petty.
The pathetic mortals who have long feared my name shall have a new title to worship me by.
Rejoice! For the age of Mars begins!
This age of gods will soon meet its end. As my father struck down the titans, I too shall strike down the vestiges of his archaic pantheon!

What comes to pass when the ageless live on without change? Through what endless cycles does one waste a god's ambition? The selfish ways of my ancestors were long my ways...but no more! By my father's many MANY examples, the hollow path of my lineage has been laid bare!

I disown my heritage, and vow that the flight of my spear will never again be so petty. The pathetic mortals who have long feared my name shall have a new title to worship me by. Rejoice! For the age of Mars begins!
The villagers sacrificed their last bull. Obviously, I felt compelled to help them. Damn the costs!
But the witch's magic claimed more and more of the simple folk, turning them against their kin - against even me!
I slew scores of them to reach the hag's stronghold.
But, once I took her head, every single possessed villager who was still alive returned mostly to normal.
Yes, I expect there was much rejoicing as the families collected their dead... And songs in my name. What a sight!

The villagers sacrificed their last bull. Obviously, I felt compelled to help them. Damn the costs! But the witch's magic claimed more and more of the simple folk, turning them against their kin ? against even me! I slew scores of them to reach the hag's stronghold. But, once I took her head, every single possessed villager who was still alive returned mostly to normal. Yes, I expect there was much rejoicing as the families collected their dead... And songs in my name. What a sight!
Diplomacy? Ha! Why it's no different than war!
Face off against your enemy and take measure of their weakness. Then, threaten that which they hold most dear.
If they resist? Beat 'em to death with an olive branch.
It's just another battlefield. Don't trouble yourself!

Diplomacy? Ha! Why it's no different than war! Face off against your enemy and take measure of their weakness. Then, threaten that which they hold most dear. If they resist? Beat 'em to death with an olive branch. It's just another battlefield. Don't trouble yourself!
Where have all the good wars gone?
, I didn't halt the song of my spear for the full cycle of an Ultorian moon.
The bodies in my wake, enough to fill mortal worlds! Ohh ho ho!
Today's war is...tedium. The same fight in a different trench. Each stake smaller than the last.
But there's a great war left out there somewhere... I'll do whatever it takes to find it.
But there's a great war left out there somewhere... I'll do whatever it takes to find it.
Tremble, all who might stand against Mars!
To those behind, rally! To those ahead... Kneel!

Where have all the good wars gone? The Stygian Conquests, the Wightfall Invasion... the centuries-long campaigns against the the forces of the Continuum... Battles that mattered, had consequence. In the final push against Sheragndar, I didn't halt the song of my spear for the full cycle of an Ultorian moon. The bodies in my wake, enough to fill mortal worlds! Hmmmm. It's not like today. Today's war is...tedium. The same fight in a different trench. Each stake smaller than the last. But there's a great war left out there somewhere... I'll do whatever it takes to find it.
What kind of plan is that?! If we wait for these idiots to finish chanting, the beast will be asleep and helpless before we even attack it. I've got a better idea... WE GO IN! AHAHAHAHA!
My thanks will come later, when you least expect it.
It's no small thing to be favored by the gods.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Oh ho ho ho ho ha ha haha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha haa!
Huh huh. Aha ha hahah ah ahaha!
Huh Huh aha ha ha ah ha ha haa!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Huh ha ha ha! Uh huh ha ha ha ha! Huh huh uh ha haa!
A fitting end to another glorious battle!
Add this one to the rolls!
Ahahaha! Did they think they could win?!
Yeeeesss! Ha ha ha ha haa!
These creatures are not entirely without merit.
I refuse to accept the terms!
No no no! That's not how it goes!
I marched all day for this?!
You're all children, playing at war.
You're all playing my game now.
Ha ha ha ha ha! Ah ha ha ha ha ha haa! Ah ha ha ha haaa!
What's with this stupid wizard anyway?
There's nothing to it when you're a god.
I can do this and still crush your skull!
If you don't enjoy a battle, you're not taking it seriously!
